activities.description: Updating the Pipeline End time for all the files for the appropriate customer that are processed in the pipeline

text.value:
UPDATE app.tbl_TriggerTable SET PipelineEndTime = GETDATE()
    WHERE Triggertime< '@{pipeline().parameters.PipelineStartTime}' and PipelineEndTime is null;

activities.name: lk_Update_WatermarkTable
activities.description: Updating Watermark table with last modified date for the table app.tbl_aaa_orders_temp.

activities.name: cp_aaa_customerorderdata_rako
activities.description: load the Customernumber and Material number from  Azure sql -app.[tbl_aaa_master_customerorderdata_stg] table to Rako label db - dbo.tbl_aaa_input_orders table.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select distinct CustomerNumber as KundenNummer,MaterialNumber as ArtikelNummerKunde,PageCount from app.[tbl_aaa_master_customerorderdata_stg] where modifiedTime >
(select coalesce(last_modified_date,'1900-01-01 00:00:00') from app.tbl_watermarktable where table_name= 'app.tbl_aaa_CustomerOrderData')
and (descriptiondq not like '%Material Number%' or
descriptiondq not like '%Artwork%' or descriptiondq is null)

       ,KonfPruefungErforderlich as KonfPruefungErforderlich

,case when d.Produkttyp = 1 AND d.Bezeichnung_Lage = 'Booklabel' then 'BOOKLET' else null end as primary_component
,case when e.produkttyp = 2 then 'BASE' else null end as secondary_component
,i.produkt as ProductName,
y.Seitenzahl as PageCount
from dbo.tbl_aaa_input_orders z
join dbo.tblTripleAArticleRef_aaa_bkp y on y.TripleARef = z.ArtikelNummerKunde and 
z.Kundennummer = left(y.etikettennummer,4) and Aktiv=-1 and z.[PageCount] = y.Seitenzahl
left join dbo.tblStammMehrkomponentenPos_aaa_bkp d on d.etikettennummer = y.etikettennummer
left join dbo.tblStammMehrkomponentenPos_aaa_bkp e on e.MehrkomponentenID = d.MehrkomponentenID and e.etikettennummer = d.etikettennummer
join dbo.sorten_aaa_bkp a on a.etikettennummer = y.etikettennummer
join dbo.stamm_aaa_bkp b on b.stammnummer = a.stammnummer
join dbo.tblprodukt_aaa_bkp i on i.id = b.produktid

select a.[MaterialNumber]
,[PurchaseOrder]
,[VendorNumber]
,[VendorName]
,[VATNumber]
,[OrderAddressName]
,[OrderAddressStreet]
,[OrderAdressPostalCode]
,[OrderAdressCity]
,[OrderAdressCountry]
,[Telephone]

,[Date]
 ,[TermsofPayment]
 ,[ContactPerson]
 ,[Email]
,[DeliveryAdressName]
 ,[DeliveryAdressNameAddition]
,[DeliveryAdressStreet]
 ,[DeliveryAdressPostalCode]
 ,[DeliveryAdressCity]
 ,[DeliveryAdressCountry]
 ,[BillingAdressName]
 ,[BillingAdressStreet]
 ,[BillingAdressPostalCode]
 ,[BillingAdressCity]
 ,[BillingAdressCountry]
,[BillingE-Mail]
,[BillingcustomerVATNumber]
,[ResidentCountryVATID]
,[HeaderText]
,cast([Item] as int) as Item
,[Size]
,[WindingMethod]
,[Qty]
,[UOM]
,cast(replace([UnitPriceCur],',','') as REAL) as [UnitPriceCur]
,[NetAmount]
,[DeliveryDate]
,[SubTotal]
,[TotalAmount]
,[Description]
,case when a.secondary_filepath is null and 
primary_component is not null and (a.DescriptionDQ not like '%Material Number%' or a.DescriptionDQ is null) then 
	case when descriptiondq is null then 'BASE Artwork file has not been uploaded in Source Folder'
	else concat([DescriptionDQ],';','BASE Artwork file has not been uploaded in Source Folder') end
when a.Primary_filepath is not null and primary_component is null and a.[Pagecount] <> 0
and (a.DescriptionDQ not like '%Material Number%'or a.DescriptionDQ is null) then
	case when descriptiondq is null then 'Master Data isnt available in RAKO Database'
	else concat([DescriptionDQ],';','Master Data isnt available in RAKO Database') end
when a.primary_filepath is null and (a.DescriptionDQ not like '%Material Number%'or a.DescriptionDQ is null) then
case when descriptiondq is null then 'BOOKLABEL Artwork File is missing in Source Folder'
	else concat([DescriptionDQ],';','BOOKLABEL Artwork File has not been uploaded in Source Folder') end
else DescriptionDQ 
end as DescriptionDQ
,cast(a.[CustomerNumber] as int) as [CustomerNumber]
,[FileName]
,cast([Etikettennummer] as int) as [Etikettennummer]
,[Aenderungsindex]

 ,[FortdruckkostenVorAenderungEuro]
 ,[EtikettJeRolleEinheit]
,[Stamm_DWRowVersion]
,getdate() as [insertedDate]
,null as [IsApproved]
 ,null as [ApproverComments]
,ERPDeliveryAddressStreet as ERPDeliveryAddressStreet
,null as [New_Etikettennummer]
,null as [New_Stammnummer]
,keycolumn as KeyColumn
,case when a.secondary_filepath is null and primary_component is not null and (a.DescriptionDQ not like '%Material Number%' or a.DescriptionDQ is null) then
case when errorjson is null then '[{"ErrorType":"Artwork File","Comment":"BASE Artwork File has not been uploaded in Source Folder"}]'
else concat(substring(errorjson,1,len(errorjson)-1),',{"ErrorType":"Artwork File","Comment":"BASE Artwork File has not been uploaded in Source Folder"}]')
end
when a.Primary_filepath is not null and primary_component is null and a.[Pagecount] <> 0
and (a.DescriptionDQ not like '%Material Number%'or a.DescriptionDQ is null) then case
when errorjson is null
then '[{"ErrorType":"Master Data","Comment":"Master Data isnt available in RAKO Database"}]'
else concat(substring(errorjson,1,len(errorjson)-1),',{"ErrorType":"Master Data","Comment":"Master Data isnt available in RAKO Database"}]')
end
when a.primary_filepath is null and (a.DescriptionDQ not like '%Material Number%'or a.DescriptionDQ is null) then
case
when errorjson is null
then '[{"ErrorType":"Artwork File","Comment":"BOOKLABEL Artwork File is missing in Source Folder"}]'
else concat(substring(errorjson,1,len(errorjson)-1),',{"ErrorType":"Artwork File","Comment":"BOOKLABEL Artwork File has not been uploaded in Source Folder"}]')
end
else errorjson end as ErrorJSON
 ,Id as Id

 

      ,CustomerName as CustomerName

 

      ,'FALSE' as IsProcessed

 

      ,FolderHierarchy as FolderHierarchy

 

      ,a.[PageCount] as PageCount

 

      ,b.ProductName as ProductName

 

        ,KonfPruefungErforderlich as KonfPruefungErforderlich

 

      ,Stamm_FSC_IstZertifiziert

 

      ,b.TripleARef

 ,TriggerTableID as TriggerTableID

      ,case
       when (a.secondary_filepath is null and primary_component is not null) or (a.Primary_filepath is not null and primary_component is null and a.[Pagecount] <> 0) then 1 else IsErrorDQ end as IsErrorDQ,
       primary_filepath as primary_filepath,secondary_filepath as secondary_filepath
from
      app.tbl_aaa_master_customerorderdata_stg a
left join app.tbl_AAA_Orders_temp b on a.MaterialNumber = b.ArtikelNummerKunde and a.CustomerNumber=b.KundenNummer and a.PageCount = b.PageCount
where a.modifiedTime > '@{activity('lk_incrementaldate_watermarktable').output.firstRow.last_modified_date}'

activities.name: lk_aaa_master_customerorderdata_stg_update
activities.description: Updating the table app.tbl_aaa_master_customerorderdata_stg with the error json needed for front end display.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
update app.tbl_aaa_master_customerorderdata_stg
set errorjson = concat( '[' ,
case when descriptiondq like '%Delivery Address%' then concat('{"ErrorType":"Shipping Address",','"Comment":"Delivery Address Street is mismatching with ERP System"}',
case when descriptiondq like '%Material Number%' or descriptiondq like '%Purchase Order%' or descriptiondq like '%Customer Number%' or descriptiondq like '%Artwork%' or descriptiondq like '%CustomerOrder%' then ',' end) end,
case when descriptiondq like '%Material Number%'  then concat('{"ErrorType":"Material Number",','"Comment":"Material Number is missing in ERP System"}',
case when descriptiondq like '%Purchase Order%' or descriptiondq like '%Customer Number%' or descriptiondq like '%Artwork%' or descriptiondq like '%CustomerOrder%' then ',' end) end,
case when descriptiondq like '%Purchase Order%'  then concat('{"ErrorType":"Purchase Order",','"Comment":"Purchase Order Item already exists in ERP"}',case when descriptiondq like '%Customer Number%' or descriptiondq like '%Artwork%' or descriptiondq like '%CustomerOrder%' then ',' end) end,
case when descriptiondq like '%Customer Number%'  then concat('{"ErrorType":"Customer Number",','"Comment":"Customer Number is missing in ERP System"}',case when descriptiondq like '%Artwork%' or descriptiondq like '%CustomerOrder%' then ',' end) end,
case when descriptiondq like '%Artwork File%' then concat('{"ErrorType":"Artwork File",','"Comment":"BOOKLABEL & BASE Artwork File  is missing in ERP System"}',case when descriptiondq like '%CustomerOrder%' then concat(',{"ErrorType":"Partial Duplicate"','"Comment":"Order data loaded has duplicates records"}') end) end,
']') where iserrordq=1 and modifiedTime >'@{activity('lk_getdate_watermark').output.firstRow.last_modified_date}';
update d
set d.IsErrorDQ = coalesce(is_error,0),descriptiondq = case when coalesce(is_error,0) = 0 then null else error_description end,IsApproved = case when coalesce(is_error,0)= 0 then null else d.IsApproved end,ModifiedDate = getdate(),
ERPDeliveryAddressStreet = ERP_DeliveryAddressStreet,
ErrorJson = case when coalesce(is_error,0) = 1 then concat( '[' ,
case when error_description like '%Delivery Address%' then concat('{"ErrorType":"Shipping Address",','"Comment":"Delivery Address Street is mismatching with ERP System"}',
case when error_description like '%Material Number%' or descriptiondq like '%Purchase Order%' or descriptiondq like '%Customer Number%' or descriptiondq like '%Artwork%' or descriptiondq like '%CustomerOrder%'  then  ',' end) end,
case when error_description like '%Material Number%'  then concat('{"ErrorType":"Material Number",','"Comment":"Material Number is missing in ERP System"}',
case when error_description like '%Purchase Order%' or descriptiondq like '%Customer Number%' or descriptiondq like '%Artwork%' or descriptiondq like '%CustomerOrder%' then ',' end) end,
case when error_description like '%Purchase Order%'  then concat('{"ErrorType":"Purchase Order",','"Comment":"Purchase Order Item already exists in ERP"}',case when descriptiondq like '%Customer Number%' or descriptiondq like '%Artwork%' or descriptiondq like '%CustomerOrder%' then ',' end) end,
case when error_description like '%Customer Number%'  then concat('{"ErrorType":"Customer Number",','"Comment":"Customer Number is missing in ERP System"}',case when descriptiondq like '%Artwork%' or descriptiondq like '%CustomerOrder%' then ',' end) end,
case when error_description like '%Artwork File%' then concat('{"ErrorType":"Artwork File",','"Comment":"Artwork File  is missing in ERP System"}',case when descriptiondq like '%CustomerOrder%' then concat(',{"ErrorType":"Partial Duplicate"','"Comment":"Order data loaded has duplicates records"}') end) end,
']') else null end
from 
app.tbl_aaa_customerorderdata d left join app.tbl_AAA_Orders_existance_temp c
on d.CustomerNumber = c.Kundennummer and d.MaterialNumber = c.ArtikelNummerKunde and d.DeliveryAdressStreet = c.DeliveryAddressStreet
and d.PurchaseOrder = c.PurchaseOrder and d.Item = c.Item
where d.IsApproved = -1 and d.ApprovalTimestamp >'@{activity('lk_getdate_watermark').output.firstRow.last_modified_date}';
select @@ROWCOUNT

sink-Rako label db.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select cast(CustomerNumber as int) as KundenNummer,MaterialNumber as ArtikelNummerKunde,DeliveryAdressStreet as DeliveryAdressStreet,PurchaseOrder as PurchaseOrder,cast(Item as int) as Item

activities.name: cp_aaa_customerorderdata_existancecheck
activities.description: Doing the 2nd level existence check for parameters sent to Rako from dbo.tbl_aaa_Orders_ExistanceCheck, the output of the check is loaded into tbl_AAA_Orders_existance_temp table in Azure sql database.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
;with cte as(
select a.KundenNummer,a.ArtikelNummerKunde,a.DeliveryAdressStreet,a.Item,a.PurchaseOrder,cast(1 as bit) as [is_error],
'Customer Number is not found in ERP System' as error_description
from dbo.tbl_aaa_Orders_ExistanceCheck a
left join dbo.kunden_aaa_bkp b on a.KundenNummer = b.Kundennummer  where b.kundennummer is null
union
select a.KundenNummer,a.ArtikelNummerKunde,a.DeliveryAdressStreet, a.Item,a.PurchaseOrder,cast(1 as bit) as [is_error],
'Material Number is not found in ERP System' as error_description
from dbo.tbl_aaa_Orders_ExistanceCheck a
left join dbo.tbltripleaarticleref_aaa_bkp c on c.TripleARef = a.ArtikelNummerKunde and left(c.etikettennummer,4) = a.kundennummer where c.TripleARef is null
union
select a.KundenNummer,a.ArtikelNummerKunde,a.DeliveryAdressStreet,a.Item,a.PurchaseOrder,cast(1 as bit) as [is_error],
'Delivery Address Street mismatching with ERP System' as error_description
from dbo.tbl_aaa_Orders_ExistanceCheck a
left join dbo.adressen_aaa_bkp d on d.kundennummer = a.kundennummer and d.IsActive= '-1' and d.Adressart = '1'
where (a.DeliveryAdressStreet <> d.Strasse or d.kundennummer is null)
union
select distinct a.KundenNummer,a.ArtikelNummerKunde,a.DeliveryAdressStreet,a.Item,a.PurchaseOrder,cast(1 as bit) as [is_error],
'Purchase Order already exists in ERP System' as error_description
from dbo.tbl_aaa_Orders_ExistanceCheck a
join (
SELECT T.Bestellnummer_Kunde,T.BestellnummerPosition,R.ArtikelnummerKunde FROM [RakoLabel].[dbo].[Teilauftraege_aaa_bkp] T
JOIN 
[RakoLabel].[dbo].[Rechnungspositionen_aaa_bkp] R
ON T.Teilauftragsnummer=R.Teilauftragsnummer
)b on a.PurchaseOrder = b.Bestellnummer_Kunde and a.Item = b.BestellnummerPosition and a.ArtikelNummerKunde = b.ArtikelnummerKunde)
,cte1 as(select KundenNummer,ArtikelNummerKunde,DeliveryAdressStreet,Item,PurchaseOrder,[is_error],
string_agg(error_description,';') as error_description from cte
group by KundenNummer,ArtikelNummerKunde,DeliveryAdressStreet,Item,is_error,PurchaseOrder)
select 
 c1.KundenNummer,c1.ArtikelNummerKunde,c1.DeliveryAdressStreet as DeliveryAddressStreet ,c1.Item,c1.PurchaseOrder,is_error,c1.error_description,
 (case when c1.error_description like '%Delivery Address%' then strasse else null end) as ERP_DeliveryAddressStreet
 from cte1 c1
 left join dbo.adressen_aaa_bkp d on d.kundennummer = c1.kundennummer and IsActive= '-1' and Adressart = '1';
 select @@ROWCOUNT
